name: liaison-application
description: This project is meant to be a kind of template to start working with Cucumber and Cypress

scripts.clean-node-modules: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force
scripts.cypress:run:homePageTest: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/features/homePage.feature' --headed --browser chrome && node cucumber-html-report.js
scripts.cypress:run:topNav: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/features/topNavigation.feature' --headed --browser chrome && node cucumber-html-report.js
scripts.cypress:run:footerSubscriptionForm: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/features/homePage.feature' --headed --browser chrome && node cucumber-html-report.js

author: cucumber
